CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 8, 1964, pg. 22 reads:"No-Hit Hurler - James Franklin (left), a pitcher with the Uptown Little League All-Stars, poises proudly with Manager Coady Bolden after pitching a no-hitter against North Braddock. The 12-year-old righthander won the game, 2-1, for his sixth win of the season against no losses.  It was his second no-hitter of the year. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Uptown Little League baseball All-Stars wearing light colored uniforms, including James Franklin, third from left, first row, and Manager Coady Bolden back left, posed on athletic field with chain link fence, another version
